channel.title: Indie 500 Show
channel.description: The Indie 500 Show podcast counts up the best independent and unsigned music out there. The indie500show.com website features the "Lucky 13" which allows surfers to listen to and rate the show's top songs for the Lucky 13 show we play once a month.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Top 500 Independent and Unsigned Songs
channel.itunes:author: Jamey Wilson
channel.itunes:summary: The Indie 500 Show podcast counts up the best independent and unsigned music out there. The indie500show.com website features the "Lucky 13" which allows surfers to listen to and rate the show's top songs for the Lucky 13 show we play once a month.

item.title: Indie 500 Show Year 3 E1....The "Head Cold" Episode
item.description: Maybe I'm a trooper, maybe I'm just desperate to hear my own (distorted) voice. Either way, the Indie 500 Show is BACK.....again.....although in a lower register. Good stuff on today's show, including music from New Moon!!! Teenage girls everywhere swoon in response. Head Cold Episode Stereotype - Next In Line Moving Day Every Avenue - Days of the Old Where Were You State of Man - Swallow Your Fears Be Still (My Heart) One Year Yesterday - Bullet Be There For You Stars Go Dim - Love Gone Mad Come Around Get Over It Jade - You Find us on Myspace at http://myspace.com/indie500show I just signed up for Twitter today follow me @theindie500show Please feel free to donate to the show to help reach the goal of transitioning the show to a full-time proposition.
item.dc:creator: Jamey Wilson
item.itunes:summary:
Maybe I'm a trooper, maybe I'm just desperate to hear my own (distorted) voice. Either way, the Indie 500 Show is BACK.....again.....although in a lower register. Good stuff on today's show, including music from New Moon!!! Teenage girls everywhere swoon in response.
Head Cold Episode
Stereotype - Next In Line Moving Day
Every Avenue - Days of the Old Where Were You
State of Man - Swallow Your Fears Be Still (My Heart)
One Year Yesterday - Bullet Be There For You
Stars Go Dim - Love Gone Mad Come Around Get Over It
Jade - You
Find us on Myspace at http://myspace.com/indie500show I just signed up for Twitter today follow me @theindie500show
Please feel free to donate to the show to help reach the goal of transitioning the show to a full-time proposition.

item.title: Indie 500 Show 2-22-09
item.description: The Indie 500 Show with Jamey is BACK! All music episode features: The Luxury - Ocean's Limerick Malcontent Renfue - Redemption What You Wanted Darling Waste - Changing of the Seasons Brightwood - Dreamer to a Dream Marked & Tied Amanda Kaletsky - Easy Loving You Bank - Try to be Brave Oh Hush! - My Neighbor Thinks I'm Famous The Fire Apes - Only You Could Make Me Happy Lo Mass Republic - Poisoned Heart Machines Five Star Iris - Is There Something I Can Do Leah - Naked on the Inside Alexa Wilkinson - Vanilla Rain Subscribe to the Indie 500 Show on itunes....and tell a friend!
item.dc:creator: Jamey Wilson
item.itunes:summary:
The Indie 500 Show with Jamey is BACK! All music episode features:
The Luxury - Ocean's Limerick Malcontent
Renfue - Redemption What You Wanted
Darling Waste - Changing of the Seasons
Brightwood - Dreamer to a Dream Marked & Tied
Amanda Kaletsky - Easy Loving You
Bank - Try to be Brave
Oh Hush! - My Neighbor Thinks I'm Famous
The Fire Apes - Only You Could Make Me Happy
Lo Mass Republic - Poisoned Heart Machines
Five Star Iris - Is There Something I Can Do
Leah - Naked on the Inside
Alexa Wilkinson - Vanilla Rain
Subscribe to the Indie 500 Show on itunes....and tell a friend!

item.title: Indie 500 Show NEW SHOw...Kinda...
item.description: Okay I'm posting an excerpt from another show in this "new" show. It is the funniest excerpt from the two and a half years that the show has been in existence. I apologize to those who have already heard Ben and me talk about nothing important, but it's worth it for the rest of you to hear it. Small file, quick listen. Playlist: Ben Johnson and Jamey Wilson Carmen and Camille - I Will Never Meiko - Boys With Girlfriends Bank - Try To Be Brave Five A.M. - Be Still
item.dc:creator: Jamey Wilson

Okay I'm posting an excerpt from another show in this "new" show. It is the funniest excerpt from the two and a half years that the show has been in existence. item.title: indie500show.com 7-20-08
item.description: New music, continuation of the Indie 500 count-up, and music from the playlist. New Music to the show: Carmen & Camille - Vancouver, B.C., CAN http://myspace.com/carmenand camille Without Reason I Will Never How Deep Is The Water Josh Olswanger - Boise, ID http://myspace.com/josholswanger The Lost Ones I Was Young Broken Iris - Sacramento, CA http://myspace.com/brokeniris The Eyes of Tomorrow Beautiful Girl Indie 500 count-up 175. Alexa Wilkinson - Vanilla Rain 176. Elliot Matsu - Cry 177. Moby Noor - Elegy 178. Trench Town Oddities - Working Again 179. Fulcrum - One Night Stand From the Indie 500 Show playlist Alexa Wilkinson - Vanilla Rain Darling Waste - Changing of the Seasons Christian Anthony - Samsonite Crash Moderns - Pimp My Life

item.title: Indie 500 Show Lucky 13 July 08
item.description: Top 13 songs in independent and unsigned music as determined by the Indie 500 Show music panel and ratings of listeners at http://indie500show.com Lucky 13 1. Amanda Kaletsky - Please Forgive Me 2. Oh Hush! - Going Down In Style 3. Brightwood - Sit Still 4. Stereotype - The Last Thing 5. Amanda Kaletsky - Say You Believe 6. State of Man - Swallow Your Fears 7. Randy Coleman - Goodbye Renee 8. Five Star Iris - Is There Something I Can Do 9. Five A.M. - Be Still 10. Renfue - What You Wanted 11. Virginia Coalition - Home This Year 12. Driving East - Sing While You Can 13. Jag Star - Does Anybody Know I had planned to play excerpts from songs 14-20, however due to the technical difficulties I had when trying to upload the show, I was forced to cut that section off of the end.
item.dc:creator: Jamey Wilson
item.itunes:summary:
Top 13 songs in independent and unsigned music as determined by the Indie 500 Show music panel and ratings of listeners at http://indie500show.com
Lucky 13
1. Amanda Kaletsky - Please Forgive Me
2. Oh Hush! - Going Down In Style
3. Brightwood - Sit Still
4. Stereotype - The Last Thing
5. Amanda Kaletsky - Say You Believe
6. State of Man - Swallow Your Fears
7. Randy Coleman - Goodbye Renee
8. Five Star Iris - Is There Something I Can Do
9. Five A.M. - Be Still
10. Renfue - What You Wanted
11. Virginia Coalition - Home This Year
12. Driving East - Sing While You Can
13. Jag Star - Does Anybody Know
I had planned to play excerpts from songs 14-20, however due to the technical difficulties I had when trying to upload the show, I was forced to cut that section off of the end.

item.title: Indie 500 Show - New Music Wednesday 5
item.description: More great new music to the show. Playlist: State of Man - Atlanta, GA http://stateofmanmusic.com Be Still (My Heart) Swallow Your Fears Bound In Chains Gayle Skidmore - Sand Diego, CA http://gayleskidmore.com/blog or http://myspace.com/gayleskidmore Paper Box Still Darling Waste - Clemson, SC http://darlingwaste.com Changing of the Seasons Better I Swear Completely Buried Emily Kate Boyd - Atlanta, GA http://emilykateboyd.com or http://myspace.com/emilykateboyd New Tattoo Paint My Heart White My American Heart - San Diego, CA http://myamericanheartrock.com or http://myspace.com/myamericanheart Tired and Uninspired The Shake (Awful Feeling) Wil Deynes - The Bronx, NY http://www.wildeynes.com or http://myspace.com/wildeynes Better Way Super Wonderful *Continued thanks to http://arielpublicity.com and http://musicsubmit.com Lucky 13 show on Sunday, July 6th, get your lists of 13 ready! Rate the Lucky 13 at http://indie500show.com

item.title: Indie 500 Show - Everybody Else Interview
item.description: All inclusive interview of the band Everybody Else and the continuation of the top 500 count-up. Playlist: Everybody Else Interview: In Memoriam Meat Market Rich Girls/Poor Girls Indie 500 Show count-up: 165. Five Star Iris - Let It All Out 166. Justin Lanning - Voices 167. Farebridge - Granted 168. Exit4 - Your Eyes 169. Edible Red - Rectify From the Indie 500 Show Playlist: Every Avenue - Where Were You Salme Dahlstrom - Hello California Everdae - Colors In Stereo - Waking Up *apologies to In Stereo who I mistakenly said was from Salt Lake on Wednesday's show, but they are actually from Atlanta, Georgia. Rate the Lucky 13 at http://indie500show.com
